ModMetaData.name: Orassans (Continued)
ModMetaData.author: Zaljerem
ModMetaData.description:
Original mod by Diana(Kitty) https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=1541519487 If the original author requests it, I will remove this update.
--
Original mod notes (1.5):
Adds a race of bipedal felines.
Orassans are a race of bipedal feline-like creatures. They hail from a cold and wet planet that orbits a gas giant. Given their planet's higher gravity, they evolved to be a bit smaller than humans, but watch out for their claws!
Adds: -Cat people -About a dozen new weapons -3 new suits of armor -Plants that can be grown in cold temperatures -An adorable little animal reminiscent of ori from ori and the blind forest
Bug reports without an error log will be deleted
Credits: Diana (Kitty) ChJees
